original_text: Then he took of the seed of the land and planted it in fertile soil. He placed it beside abundant waters. He set it like a willow twig,
korean_text: 또 그 땅의 종자를 꺾어 옥토에 심되 수양버들 가지처럼 큰 물 가에 심더니

sentences.original_text: Then he took of the seed of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그 땅의 씨를 취하여

sentences.original_text: and planted it in fertile soil.
He placed it beside abundant waters.
He set it like a willow twig,
